name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William L. (Sonny) BURNS, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William L. (Sonny) BURNS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINIONS
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael von Moschzisker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Division, Kenneth S. Gallant, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
411 A.2d 215
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. William L. (Sonny) BURNS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 25, 1980.
Decided Feb. 25, 1980.
Michael von Moschzisker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Division, Kenneth S. Gallant, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
